robotPu.setServoInitialState: Set servo initial state. This is a background function, only for after-sales use, users do not need to operate.
robotPu.setWalkSpeedRange: Set walking speed range. Configure maximum speed of robot for forward and backward movement.
robotPu.ultrasonicDistance: Get ultrasonic sensor distance. Returns distance detected by the ultrasonic sensor, units can be selected as centimeters or inches.
robotPu.setAmbienceLight: Set ambience light. Set the selected ambience light to the specified RGB color.
robotPu.setEyesState: Set left/right eye state. Turn the left and right eyes on or off.
robotPu.setLeftEyeBrightness: Set left eye brightness. Adjust the brightness of the left eye light.
robotPu.setRightEyeBrightness: Set right eye brightness. Adjust the brightness of the right eye light.
robotPu.executeAction: Execute action. Perform the specified preset action. When "Explore" is selected, the robot will walk forward and automatically turn when encountering obstacles; when "Remote Control" is selected, it needs to be used with the "Remote Control" function.
robotPu.setMoveDirection: Set robot move direction. Set the movement direction of the PU robot.
robotPu.setWalkSpeed: Set robot walk speed and turn. Set the walking speed and turning direction of the PU robot.
robotPu.talk: Talk. Make the robot say the specified text.
robotPu.sing: Sing. Make the robot sing the specified song or command.
robotPu.setServoAngle: Set servo angle. Directly rotate the specified servo to the target angle.
robotPu.smoothSetServoAngle: Smooth set servo angle. Smoothly rotate the specified servo to the target angle with the specified step length.
robotPu.setControllerRadioGroup: Set controller radio group. Set the radio channel for the controller (0-255). This block automatically initializes all controller buttons.
robotPu.readJoystickValue: Read joystick value. Read the joystick value for the specified axis (-1 to 1).
robotPu.initControllerButtons: Initialize controller buttons. Set up pull-up resistors for all controller buttons.
robotPu.getControllerButtonPressed: Get controller button pressed. Check if the specified controller button is pressed.
robotPu.sendControlValue: Send control value. Send a control value to the robot.
robotPu.sendTextMessage: Send text message. Send a text message to the robot.
robotPu.enableRemoteControlWithGroup: Enable remote control with group. Enable the robot to receive remote control commands and set the radio group.
robotPu.disableRemoteControl: Disable remote control. Disable the robot from receiving remote control commands.
robotPu.onControlValueReceived: On control value received. Run code when a control value is received from the controller.
robotPu.getControlValue: Get control value. Get the most recently received control value from the controller.
